'''Ripple of Fate''' is [[Mona]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*On the 3rd Normal Attack, Mona will perform a short backward or forward teleport depending on whether or not her distance from the enemy is greater than or equal to '''7.5m'''.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|2|Lunar Chain}}
*{{TalentNote|constellation|6|Rhetorics of Calamitas}}
